metadata.title: CVE-2017-12099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the upgrade of the legacy Meshattribute 'tface' of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. Aspecially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in abuffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of theapplication. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use it asa library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
